replies.body:
You don't necessarily **have** to be level 30, but it certainly helps, as most level 30's have a good grip on how the game works and what interactions may actually be bugs rather than features or outcomes that should happen under certain circumstances. 

We typically look for really active players who are a positive influence on the community, so meeting those two requirements would be my suggestion on things to focus on. Also be sure that you've applied for the PBE on [this page.](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if you have any questions.
